title: 700 Gentlemen
description: 1917: The Western Frontier  There’s a debt to be paid in Delamar, and Daniel is hot on the trail. 700 men are going to pay for what they did to him. They know what they’ve done and they deserve what’s coming, but out in the frontier, the line between justice and vengeance becomes blurry.  Only one man stands in his way, a marshal racing to end the bloodshed that has cut across state lines. It might already be too late. ​  700 men. Every last one of them owes a debt—and Daniel intends to collect.  700 Gentlemen is the opening story of the “Dead West” series.
author: Elijah Cooksey
